text:
" Si, je l'entend déjà hurler. Haha!"
" Petite garce..." grogna Ironhide.
Comme si elle l'avait entendu, l'enregistrement lui répondit.
" Oh Ironhide, ça t'énerve? Tu n'aimes pas le rose? Tu es en colère? Pauvre choux! Tu vas devoir laver ton altform parce qu'il est rose!"
Son regard se durçit.
" Imagine Sunny qui n'arrive plus à marcher avec sa jambe gauche parce qu'il a des hématomes tellement tu l'as cogné! Il ne voit plus rien de l'oeil droit!"
" On a dû la retenir de te rendre une petite visite." dit Sunstreaker, faisant son entrée dans le champs de la caméra lentement en titubant.
Ratchet écarquilla les yeux en voyant l'ampleur des dégâts, le corps meurtri apparut à l'écran, jamais n'aurait-il cru que les dégâts étaient d'une telle ampleur...
trans:
‘Yes, I can hear him screaming already. Ahah!’
‘Little bitch...’ growled Ironhide.
As if she'd heard him, the recording replied.
"Oh Ironhide, does it upset you? Don't you like pink? Are you angry? Poor baby! You're going to have to wash your altform because it's pink!"
His gaze grew hard.
"Just imagine Sunny who can't walk anymore with his left leg because he's got bruises since you hit him so hard! He can't see out of his right eye!"
"We had to stop her from paying you a little visit," said Sunstreaker, staggering slowly into view.
Ratchet's eyes widened as he saw the extent of the damage, his battered body appearing on the screen, he would never have believed that the damage was so severe...
